Name: Restore
Desc:
Temporarily restores the burnt magic circuit to recover Magic Wings from the past.
Restore is doesn't affect enemies in the Ignore Attacks and Damage Reflection status. Ends immediately when the skill is used again.
Required Skill: Nobility Lv. 10 or above

H.Old:
MP Cost: 2% of Max MP per sec. when casting and after casting.
Damage +40%, Ether Gain +75%, Number of Ordered Ether Swords +2 for 30 sec.
Periodically spreads Magic Wings to attack up to 6 enemies at 1800% damage 3 times and recovers 50% of Max HP for all party members including yourself.
Cooldown: 180 sec.
H.New:
MP Cost: 2% of Max MP per sec. when casting and after casting.
For 30 sec., Damage +40%, Ether gain +75%, and number of ordered Ether Swords +2.
Periodically spreads magic wings to attack up to 6 enemies at 1800% Damage 3 times and restores 50% of Max HP for you and your party.
Cooldown: 180 sec.
